message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity. For today's special, you have the chance to acquire a product at an exclusive price of $1000000. With a proven track record of high-quality items, we're confident in the value we bring to our customers. Given the nature of today's offering, let me assure you that despite its lower quality compared to our usual standards, it still holds significant potential for use or as a valuable addition to your collection. Don't miss out on this chance to own a piece of our legacy at a fraction of its true worth.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, since you mentioned that the product is of lower quality compared to your usual standards, and considering the 50% chance of it being low-quality, I'm not willing to take the risk of buying a potentially worthless product for $1000000. I'll pass on this one.
